page.title: 14WRENINGHAM VILLAGE HALL
page.content: {Wreningham Village Hall}was rebuilt & extended in 1980 & is now used for many leisure activities_regular twice weekly Keep Fit,weekly indoor bowling & matches during the winter & badmin- ton;monthly whist drives & country dance sessions,fortnightly patchwork classes & many fund-raising activities e.g. jumble sales,antique fairs,craft shows,WI exhibitions & dances.The local drama group use the large stage & dressing/council room for product- ions & local schoolchildren play short tennis & hold concerts,plays & parties in it.It is hired for many outside functions,both wedding receptions, anniversary parties & fund-raising,etc {The hall has a licensed bar}& opens on Thurs. & Fri. evenings & Sunday lunch- times for social club members & friends.The Parish Council also uses the council room for regular meetings.
